content: लेशः [लिश्-घञ्] {@--1@} A small bit or portion, a particle, an atom, a very small quantity; क्लेश (<ab>v. l.</ab> स्वेद) लेशैरभिन्नं <ls>Ś. 2. 4</ls>; श्चमबारिलेशैः <ls>Ku. 3. 38</ls>; so भाक्ति°, गुण° &c. {@--2@} Smallness, littleness. {@--3@} A measure of time (equal to two {%kalās%}). {@--4@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech which consists in representing what is usually considered as an advantage to be a disadvantage and {%vice%} {%versa%}. It is thus defined in <ls>R. G.</ls>: --गुणस्यानिष्टसाधनतया दोषत्वेन दोषस्येष्टसाधनतया गुणत्वेन च वर्णनं लेशः; for examples see {%ad loc.%} (Mammaṭa appears to include this figure under विशेष, see <ls>K. P. 10</ls> under विशेष and commentary).
